entry.title: Blockchain Technology: Revolutionizing Industries Beyond Finance
entry.summary:
Blockchain technology, which is most usually linked with cryptocurrencies, has emerged as a transformational force that goes far beyond banking. Blockchain has the potential to change a variety of industries, including healthcare, supply chain management, and voting systems, due to its decentralized and transparent nature. In this article, we will look at how blockchain technology is altering various industries, opening up new avenues for efficiency, transparency, and trust. Blockchain Technology in Healthcare The incorporation of blockchain technology has the potential to dramatically enhance the healthcare business. Here's how it's done:
Secure Data Management: By offering a secure and immutable ledger for healthcare records, blockchain has the potential to tranâ€¦

entry.title: Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs): Transforming the Future of Money in 2023
entry.summary: In an era of tremendous technology breakthroughs, the world of banking is about to undergo a significant transformation. Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) have emerged as a game-changing invention with enormous potential to shape the future of money. CBDCs are poised to transform the way we transact, store value, and interact with the financial system as digital representations of a country's legal currency. In this article, we will look into CBDCs and their potential implications for the future of money. CBDCs: An Introduction CBDCs are digital currencies created and regulated by central banks that serve as a digital representation of a country's fiat currency. CBDCs, as opposed to decentralized cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum, are totally centraâ€¦

entry.title: The Growth of Stablecoins: Providing Stability Within the Crypto Market
entry.summary: The world of cryptocurrencies has seen a substantial increase in popularity and adoption in recent years. As this digital ecosystem grows, one sort of cryptocurrency has emerged as a significant participant in providing stability in the unpredictable cryptocurrency market: stablecoins. Stablecoins have gained traction as a safe alternative, bringing stability to investors and users alike, thanks to their unique architecture and intrinsic properties. In this article, we will look at the rise of stablecoins and their critical role in giving stability to the crypto market. Stablecoins Explained Stablecoins are a type of cryptocurrency that is intended to reduce the inherent volatility of traditional cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin and Ethereum. Stablecoins, as opposeâ€¦

Bitcoin consolidated around the $30,000 level on Friday, as traders attempted to maintain bullish sentiment following recent gains. The worldâ€™s largest cryptocurrency briefly dropped below this point earlier in the day, before bulls swept in to buy the dip in price. However, ethereum fell below a recent high above $1,900.
Bitcoin
Bitcoin remained above the $30,000 level on Friday, as traders attempted to keep sentiment bullish heading into the weekend.
Following a low of $29,679.16 earlier in the day, BTC/USD moved to a peak of $30,334.40 as the day progressed.
Price has since gone on to fall from its previous high, as the 14-day relative strength index (RSI) encountered a point of resistance.
Bitcoin chart by TradingView

entry.title: Japanâ€™s Largest Bank MUFG To Introduce Stablecoins Anchored To Global Currencies
entry.summary:
One of Japanâ€™s most prominent banks, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG), has announced its intention to issue global stablecoins linked to various foreign currencies, notably the United States dollar. To accomplish this, the financial powerhouse will utilize its Progmat platform for minting these coins.
Since the beginning of June, Japan has implemented a new law, allowing licensed banks, trust companies, and registered money transfer agents in the country to legally issue these cryptocurrencies. By establishing itself as a global hub for stablecoin issuance, Japan has positioned itself to support the expansion of decentralized internet and web3 companies.
This strategic move is expected to open up lucrative opportunities within the digital realm, allowing the nation to explore and â€¦

entry.title: Future-Proof Inheritance: Why Bitcoin Holds The Keys To My Will
entry.summary: This is an opinion editorial by Konstantin Rabin, a finance and technology writer. Death is not something that many people like talking about all too much, but it is crucial to sit and have a good think about what will happen to all of your earthly belongings when the inevitable eventually happens. Despite its importance, a 2021 study found that less than half of all adults in the U.S. have a will set up at all. While many are too scared of thinking about it, a large number of people simply feel that they lack the know-how for setting one up or want to wait until they have children before they feel the need to sort out their afterlives. Over the last year or so, I decided to have this â€œwillâ€ discussion with myself, and after much thinking and many hours of research, the answer for the besâ€¦

entry.title: Fed Chair Powell Makes Subtle Nod To Ripple, Coincidence Or Not?
entry.summary:
A rumor is currently circulating on Twitter about an alleged connection between Ripple Labs and the US Federal Reserve (Fed). Even though the story is apparently very far-fetched, it is nevertheless a story worth telling, and we donâ€™t want to keep it quiet.
The origin of the rumor is popular XRP army member @NFAdotcrypto. The user shared a video clip from Fed chairman Jerome Powellâ€™s semi-annual testimony before the US Congress yesterday. Congressman Wiley Nickel asks the Fed chairman how he liked the recent concert by the Grateful Dead, an American rock band founded in 1965.
Powell replied that he had been a â€œGrateful Dead fanâ€ for 50 years, whereupon Congressman Wiley Nickel replied, â€œI found a universal truth, I like people who like the Grateful Dead.â€ And here comes the connection â€¦

entry.title: Lawyer Seeks Reopening of Onecoin Case in Bulgaria, Seizure of Assets
entry.summary:
A lawyer representing Onecoin victims has urged Bulgarian authorities to reopen an investigation into the crypto pyramid scheme and seize assets to compensate his clients. The attorney is asking officials in Sofia to take into account developments he considers related to the case, including the recent murder of a Bulgarian crime figure in South Africa.
Attorney Hopes New Bulgarian Chief Prosecutor Takes on Onecoin Investigation
Dr. Jonathan Levy, a legal representative for people affected by Onecoin from several countries, has filed a new request that Bulgariaâ€™s acting top prosecutor reopens an investigation into the multi-billion dollar crypto Ponzi scheme and seize associated assets for restitution of the victims.
In a letter to the Bulgarian Ministry of Justice, Levy is turning aâ€¦

entry.title: Japanâ€™s Largest Bank to Support Global Stablecoin Issuance
entry.summary: Top Japanese banking group Mitsubishi UFJ (MUFG) is reportedly holding discussions with stablecoin issuers to have them issue such tokens on the group's blockchain platform. MUFG is also engaging entertainment companies and non-financial businesses on stablecoin projects. The announcement is in conjunction with the implementation of Japan's stablecoin law on June 1. The law enabled the country's licensed financial institutions and registered money transfer agencies to issue stablecoins. However, it only allowed for the issuance and use of such tokens that are fully backed by fiat currencies. Japan Eases Laws on Stablecoins Speaking in an interview with Bloomberg, MUFG's vice president of product, Tatsuya Saito, said the group was engaging multiple parties to have themâ€¦

entry.title: IMF Acknowledges Ineffectiveness of Banning Cryptocurrencies, Encourages CBDC Adoption
entry.summary:
The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has recognized that banning cryptocurrencies may not be an effective long-term strategy. Instead, the focus should be on meeting digital payment needs and improving transparency in the use of these digital assets.Â
This acknowledgment comes as Latin American and Caribbean (LAC) countries lead the way in adopting digital money solutions, with several nations exploring Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) to foster financial inclusion and address currency substitution concerns.
The comment was made in a post promoting Central Bank Digital Currencies (CBDCs) in the Latin America and Caribbean (LAC) regions. It stated that LAC countries are â€œat the forefront of digital money adoption,â€ then delineating the term digital money into CBDCs and crypto asâ€¦

entry.title: Study: Crypto Adoption More Significant in Poorer African Countries
entry.summary:
While as much as 66% of surveyed African residents claimed to have been exposed to digital assets like bitcoin, about 82% of respondents said they have never owned crypto. The findings of the survey study suggest that the adoption of crypto is more significant in poorer African countries than in better-off countries like Kenya and South Africa.
Poor Nations Africaâ€™s Leading Crypto Countries
According to a study by Kasi Insights, a Kenyan research firm, as much as 82% of surveyed Africans have never owned crypto. Of the remaining 18%, only 8% of the respondents admitted to being holders of digital assets such as bitcoin. In contrast, as much as 66% of the respondents said they have been exposed to crypto. However, only 8% said they had â€œa considerable amount of exposure to crypto.â€
Aâ€¦

entry.title: How 1 Simple Question Kickstarted Performance Artist Foodmasku's Plunge Into NFTs
entry.summary: As his food mask creations went viral on the Internet during the COVID lockdowns, reposted on TikTok and Instagram without his consent, he soon asked: "How do I protect my digital files?" Performance artist Foodmasku describes at this year's NFC Lisbon how that simple question spiraled into a minting collection after collection of his edible works.

entry.title: Arianee CEO Pegs Wine and Spirits as Next 'Exciting' Industry to Make Web3 Leap
entry.summary: CEO and co-founder of Arianee Pierre Nicolas Hurstel unpacks the wide spectrum of digital collectibles from 10,000 PFP collections to access passes for exclusive events. And with an unannounced big brand soon joining, Hurstel revealed at NFC Lisbon which kind of NFTs big brands are moving towards.
